game.name: Wattam
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wattam(와탐)에서 Keita Takahashi의 독창적 정신 세계에 푹 빠져 보세요. 모든 것이 사라지고 상실된 고독한 세계를 탐험하세요. 촌장이 우정의 기쁨을 재발견하고, 잃어버린 기억을 되찾고, 세계와 다시 연결할 수 있도록 혼자 게임을 하거나 또는 같은 화면에서 협력 플레이하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wattam is a game about the joys of friendship and discovery, from the imagination of Keita Takahashi (creator of Katamari Damacy and Noby Noby Boy) and developer Funomena.

reviewHighlights.text: A kind local co-op experience to play with a kid, you can finish the story in 3-4 evenings time, or just fool around sandbox style. It's about metemps...
Silly, colorful and surreal. Wattam lives up to the expectations that come along with the Keita Takahashi name. This one has a little more existential...
